response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～禁断の映像～
response.overview: The series has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites, and has over 80 titles in total! This time, the series includes horrifying footage that ventures into forbidden territory. Unknown territory that is irresistible to psychic and occult fans, you will unintentionally want to watch it again and again. The shocking horror is addictive. These images are included in this collection.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Forbidden Footage
